properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 10:29AM CST until January 12 at 3:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 6 to 10 ft expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from the Southwest Pass of the
Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana out 20 NM and
Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to
Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 AM CST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM CST SUNDAY
